name: Phantom Lancer
title: Azwraith
lore: The last of the Revenant Army, Azwraith fights with an army of illusions to confuse and overwhelm foes.

spiritLance.name: Spirit Lance
spiritLance.description: Throws a lance at a target, damaging and slowing them while creating an illusion.

doppelganger.name: Doppelganger
doppelganger.description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes, reappearing with illusions.

phantomRush.name: Phantom Rush
phantomRush.description: When attacking from range, charges with bonus agility.

juxtapose.name: Juxtapose
juxtapose.description: Attacks have a chance to create an illusion. Illusions can also spawn more illusions.
